document_data.name: ''Drow Outrunner Armor''
document_data.mainbody: e armor was light and didn't provide full body coverage, but was bedecked in straps, [[pouch]]es, [[bandolier]]s.
document_data.Description: The armor was light and didn't provide full body coverage, but was bedecked in straps, [[pouch]]es, [[bandolier]]s.
document_data.Powers: The protections imbued in the armor made it exceptionally good at keeping the wearer alive in the face of all sorts of threats, especially magical attacks. It also made them immune to most natural [[poison]]s, and resistant to magical ones.
document_data.History: Suits of ''outrunner armor'' were found in Mistress [[Laerion'vyr]]'s [[Drow outpost (Stonelands)|drow outpost]] in the [[Stonelands]].
